dict.acceptation: 困难，麻烦，难事；难度；异议，争论，纠葛；财政困难，（经济）拮据；

sent.orig: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; sees the opportunity in every difficulty. " 1"
sent.trans: 3“悲观者认为每一个机会都是困难的；乐观者认为，机会在每一个困难中。”

sent.orig: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
sent.trans: 悲观者在机会中看到困难；乐观者在困难中看到机会。

sent.orig: The writer puts forward the development orientation of difficulty movement: diversification, high-difficulty and high-quality.
sent.trans: 提出难度动作正向着多样化、高难度、高质量的方向发展。

sent.orig: For the expropriated farmers, re-employment difficulty directly leads to a series of life difficulty.
sent.trans: 对于失地农民而言，再就业难是他们陷于各种生活困境的直接原因。

sent.orig: Mathematics learning difficulty learning difficulty and increasingly draws people's attention. "
sent.trans: 数学学习困难学生（简称数困生）问题作为学困生问题的子问题也越来越引起了大家的广泛关注。
